description: Sunshine Bowls is brought to you by two bold brothers with the shared the goal of capturing the sunshiney vibes of Southern California and serving them in the form of incredibly tasty Acai bowls to all the deserving Denverites.Now you can come and treat yourself to nutritious deliciousness with this truck’s selection of fabulous bowls, including…Pow-Pow Bowl: Frozen blend of Acai, Banana, Strawberry, Blueberry, Peanut Butter and Coconut Milk, and topped with granola, banana, blueberry, strawberry, and Cacao NibsSunshine Bowl: Frozen blend of Pitaya, Pineapple, Banana, Strawberry and Pineapple Juice. Topped with Granola, Banana, Strawberry, Pineapple, and Goji Berry. For all this and more, come out and try Sunshine Bowls, and your taste buds will have a mighty fine time!
name: Sunshine Bowls
